pageContext.public_note: Halloween LEGOÂ® Adventure, ages 5-7 Get into the spirit of the season! Join us as we, design and build the coolest jack-o-lanterns, haunted houses, and spooky ghosts... that move! This workshop is led by an experienced Play-Well instructor.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: This Halloween season, join Play-Well TEKnologies for a LEGO Haunted House workshop!  Participants will design their own custom Haunted Houses. Add a rickety staircase, boarded up windows, and the creepiest yard on the street. Whose house will be the spookiest?
